subcategory.name: Toggles
subcategory.description: Toggle and switch examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS toggle components to add on/off switches for settings like dark mode, notifications, and feature flags. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
